Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® Cardiac Marker Calibration Verification Test Sets
VALIDATE® CM1 Calibration Verification Test Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE Cardiac Marker Calibration Verification Test Sets for verifying calibration and linearity of CK-MB and Myoglobin in human serum on automated, semi-automated and manual chemistry systems.
Indications for Use Summary: Used by trained laboratory professionals for quantitatively verifying calibration, validating reportable ranges, and determining linearity in automated, semi-automated and manual chemistry systems for CK-MB and Myoglobin.
